title: Stability study of a superbase-derived ionic liquid [mTBNH][OAc] with enhanced cellulose dissolution ability: thermal and natural degradation
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00087K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ivan Melikhov, Irina Sulaeva, Stefano Barbini, Markus Bacher, Dev Sriranganadane, Ilkka Kilpeläinen, Thomas Rosenau, Antje Potthast
The novel guanidine-based ionic liquid [mTBNH][OAc], which is suitable for an environmentally friendly lyocell-like spinning process, exhibits both high natural and thermal stability, superior to that of IONCELL ILs.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
